changeSet.author: jordanchavez
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE EMAIL_STATUS_REF( EMAIL_STATUS_ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL DEFAULT NEWID(), CODE VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL ) ALTER TABLE EMAIL_STATUS_REF ADD CONSTRAINT EMAIL_STATUS_REF_PK PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED(EMAIL_STATUS_ID) ALTER TABLE EMAIL_STATUS_REF ADD CONSTRAINT EMAIL_STATUS_REF_UQ_CODE UNIQUE(CODE)

changeSet.author: jordanchavez
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE [EMAIL]( EMAIL_ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL DEFAULT NEWID(), EMAIL_STATUS_ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL, TRIES SMALLINT NOT NULL, SENT_TS DATETIME NULL, TO_ADDRESS VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, CC_ADDRESS VARCHAR(200) NULL, SUBJECT VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, BODY VARCHAR(MAX) NOT NULL, CREATED_BY CHAR(6) NOT NULL, CREATED_TS DATETIME NOT NULL, UPDATED_BY CHAR(6) NOT NULL, UPDATED_TS DATETIME NOT NULL ) ALTER TABLE [EMAIL] ADD CONSTRAINT EMAIL_PK PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED(EMAIL_ID) ALTER TABLE [EMAIL] ADD CONSTRAINT EMAIL_FK_EMAIL_STATUS_ID FOREIGN KEY(EMAIL_STATUS_ID) REFERENCES EMAIL_STATUS_REF(EMAIL_STATUS_ID)

changeSet.author: jordanchavez
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE EMAIL_TEMPLATE( EMAIL_TEMPLATE_ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL DEFAULT NEWID(), CODE VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL ) ALTER TABLE EMAIL_TEMPLATE ADD CONSTRAINT EMAIL_TEMPLATE_PK PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED(EMAIL_TEMPLATE_ID) ALTER TABLE EMAIL_TEMPLATE ADD CONSTRAINT EMAIL_TEMPLATE_UQ_CODE UNIQUE(CODE)

changeSet.author: jordanchavez
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE EMAIL_TEMPLATE_VARIABLE( EMAIL_TEMPLATE_VARIABLE_ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL DEFAULT NEWID(), EMAIL_TEMPLATE_ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, TOKEN VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL ) ALTER TABLE EMAIL_TEMPLATE_VARIABLE ADD CONSTRAINT EMAIL_TEMPLATE_VARIABLE_PK PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED(EMAIL_TEMPLATE_VARIABLE_ID) ALTER TABLE EMAIL_TEMPLATE_VARIABLE ADD CONSTRAINT EMAIL_TEMPLATE_VARIABLE_FK FOREIGN KEY(EMAIL_TEMPLATE_ID) REFERENCES EMAIL_TEMPLATE(EMAIL_TEMPLATE_ID) ALTER TABLE EMAIL_TEMPLATE_VARIABLE ADD CONSTRAINT EMAIL_TEMPLATE_VARIABLE_UQ_EMAIL_TEMPLATE_ID_NAME UNIQUE(EMAIL_TEMPLATE_ID, NAME)

changeSet.author: jordanchavez
changeSet.sql: INSERT INTO EMAIL_TEMPLATE(CODE, DESCRIPTION) VALUES ('DAILY_LENDER', 'Consolidated Daily Lender'), ('LENDER_MONITORING', 'Lender Monitoring')

changeSet.author: jordanchavez
changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE EMAIL_TEMPLATE_VERSION( EMAIL_TEMPLATE_VERSION_ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL DEFAULT NEWID(), EMAIL_TEMPLATE_ID UNIQUEIDENTIFIER NOT NULL, NAME VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL, DESCRIPTION VARCHAR(MAX) NOT NULL, VERSION INT NOT NULL, ACTIVE_IND CHAR(1) NOT NULL, ACTIVATED_TS DATETIME NULL, SUBJECT VARCHAR(200) NOT NULL, BODY VARCHAR(MAX) NOT NULL, CREATED_BY CHAR(6) NOT NULL, CREATED_TS DATETIME NOT NULL, UPDATED_BY CHAR(6) NOT NULL, UPDATED_TS DATETIME NOT NULL ) ALTER TABLE EMAIL_TEMPLATE_VERSION ADD CONSTRAINT EMAIL_TEMPLATE_VERSION_PK PRIMARY KEY NONCLUSTERED(EMAIL_TEMPLATE_VERSION_ID) ALTER TABLE EMAIL_TEMPLATE_VERSION ADD CONSTRAINT EMAIL_TEMPLATE_VERSION_FK_EMAIL_TEMPLATE_ID FOREIGN KEY(EMAIL_TEMPLATE_ID) REFERENCES EMAIL_TEMPLATE(EMAIL_TEMPLATE_ID) ALTER TABLE EMAIL_TEMPLATE_VERSION ADD CONSTRAINT EMAIL_TEMPLATE_VERSION_UQ_EMAIL_TEMPLATE_ID_VERSION UNIQUE(EMAIL_TEMPLATE_ID, VERSION)

changeSet.author: jordanchavez
